definitions.definition: Anything that is sold by itself, especially articles of clothing such as blouses, skirts, jackets, and pants.
A printing of an article from a periodical as its own distinct publication and distributed independently, often with different page numbers.

main_definition: ( usually in the plural ) Anything that is sold by itself, especially articles of clothing such as blouses, skirts, jackets, and pants.
secondary_definitions: ( bibliography ) A printing of an article from a periodical as its own distinct publication and distributed independently, often with different page numbers.
